description: This standalone instrumentation enables messaging spans for Kafka producers and consumers, and collects internal Kafka client metrics.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.assigned_partitions
metrics.description: The number of partitions currently assigned to this consumer

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.bytes_consumed_rate
metrics.description: The average number of bytes consumed per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.bytes_consumed_total
metrics.description: The total number of bytes consumed

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.commit_latency_avg
metrics.description: The average time taken for a commit request

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.commit_latency_max
metrics.description: The max time taken for a commit request

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.commit_rate
metrics.description: The number of commit calls per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.commit_total
metrics.description: The total number of commit calls

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.connection_close_rate
metrics.description: The number of connections closed per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.connection_close_total
metrics.description: The total number of connections closed

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.connection_count
metrics.description: The current number of active connections.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.connection_creation_rate
metrics.description: The number of new connections established per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.connection_creation_total
metrics.description: The total number of new connections established

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.failed_authentication_rate
metrics.description: The number of connections with failed authentication per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.failed_authentication_total
metrics.description: The total number of connections with failed authentication

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.failed_reauthentication_rate
metrics.description: The number of failed re-authentication of connections per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.failed_reauthentication_total
metrics.description: The total number of failed re-authentication of connections

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.failed_rebalance_rate_per_hour
metrics.description: The number of failed rebalance events per hour

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.failed_rebalance_total
metrics.description: The total number of failed rebalance events

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.fetch_latency_avg
metrics.description: The average time taken for a fetch request.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.fetch_latency_max
metrics.description: The max time taken for any fetch request.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.fetch_rate
metrics.description: The number of fetch requests per second.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.fetch_size_avg
metrics.description: The average number of bytes fetched per request

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.fetch_size_max
metrics.description: The maximum number of bytes fetched per request

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.fetch_throttle_time_avg
metrics.description: The average throttle time in ms

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.fetch_throttle_time_max
metrics.description: The maximum throttle time in ms

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.fetch_total
metrics.description: The total number of fetch requests.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.heartbeat_rate
metrics.description: The number of heartbeats per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.heartbeat_total
metrics.description: The total number of heartbeats

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.incoming_byte_rate
metrics.description: The number of bytes read off all sockets per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.incoming_byte_total
metrics.description: The total number of bytes read off all sockets

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.io_ratio
metrics.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent doing I/O

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.io_time_ns_avg
metrics.description: The average length of time for I/O per select call in nanoseconds.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.io_wait_ratio
metrics.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent waiting

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.io_wait_time_ns_avg
metrics.description: The average length of time the I/O thread spent waiting for a socket ready for reads or writes in nanoseconds.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.io_waittime_total
metrics.description: The total time the I/O thread spent waiting

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.iotime_total
metrics.description: The total time the I/O thread spent doing I/O

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.join_rate
metrics.description: The number of group joins per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.join_time_avg
metrics.description: The average time taken for a group rejoin

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.join_time_max
metrics.description: The max time taken for a group rejoin

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.join_total
metrics.description: The total number of group joins

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.last_heartbeat_seconds_ago
metrics.description: The number of seconds since the last coordinator heartbeat was sent

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.last_poll_seconds_ago
metrics.description: The number of seconds since the last poll() invocation.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.last_rebalance_seconds_ago
metrics.description: The number of seconds since the last successful rebalance event

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.network_io_rate
metrics.description: The number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.network_io_total
metrics.description: The total number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.outgoing_byte_rate
metrics.description: The number of outgoing bytes sent to all servers per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.outgoing_byte_total
metrics.description: The total number of outgoing bytes sent to all servers

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.partition_assigned_latency_avg
metrics.description: The average time taken for a partition-assigned rebalance listener callback

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.partition_assigned_latency_max
metrics.description: The max time taken for a partition-assigned rebalance listener callback

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.poll_idle_ratio_avg
metrics.description: The average fraction of time the consumer's poll() is idle as opposed to waiting for the user code to process records.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.rebalance_latency_avg
metrics.description: The average time taken for a group to complete a successful rebalance, which may be composed of several failed re-trials until it succeeded

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.rebalance_latency_max
metrics.description: The max time taken for a group to complete a successful rebalance, which may be composed of several failed re-trials until it succeeded

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.rebalance_latency_total
metrics.description: The total number of milliseconds this consumer has spent in successful rebalances since creation

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.rebalance_rate_per_hour
metrics.description: The number of successful rebalance events per hour, each event is composed of several failed re-trials until it succeeded

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.rebalance_total
metrics.description: The total number of successful rebalance events, each event is composed of several failed re-trials until it succeeded

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.records_consumed_rate
metrics.description: The average number of records consumed per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.records_consumed_total
metrics.description: The total number of records consumed

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.records_lag
metrics.description: The latest lag of the partition

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.records_lag_avg
metrics.description: The average lag of the partition

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.records_lag_max
metrics.description: The maximum lag in terms of number of records for any partition in this window

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.records_lead
metrics.description: The latest lead of the partition

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.records_lead_avg
metrics.description: The average lead of the partition

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.records_lead_min
metrics.description: The minimum lead in terms of number of records for any partition in this window

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.records_per_request_avg
metrics.description: The average number of records in each request

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.request_rate
metrics.description: The number of requests sent per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.request_size_avg
metrics.description: The average size of requests sent.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.request_size_max
metrics.description: The maximum size of any request sent.

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.request_total
metrics.description: The total number of requests sent

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.response_rate
metrics.description: The number of responses received per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.response_total
metrics.description: The total number of responses received

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.select_rate
metrics.description: The number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.select_total
metrics.description: The total number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.successful_authentication_no_reauth_total
metrics.description: The total number of connections with successful authentication where the client does not support re-authentication

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.successful_authentication_rate
metrics.description: The number of connections with successful authentication per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.successful_authentication_total
metrics.description: The total number of connections with successful authentication

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.successful_reauthentication_rate
metrics.description: The number of successful re-authentication of connections per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.successful_reauthentication_total
metrics.description: The total number of successful re-authentication of connections

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.sync_rate
metrics.description: The number of group syncs per second

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.sync_time_avg
metrics.description: The average time taken for a group sync

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.sync_time_max
metrics.description: The max time taken for a group sync

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.sync_total
metrics.description: The total number of group syncs

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.time_between_poll_avg
metrics.description: The average delay between invocations of poll().

metrics.name: kafka.consumer.time_between_poll_max
metrics.description: The max delay between invocations of poll().

metrics.name: kafka.producer.batch_size_avg
metrics.description: The average number of bytes sent per partition per-request.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.batch_size_max
metrics.description: The max number of bytes sent per partition per-request.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.batch_split_rate
metrics.description: The average number of batch splits per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.batch_split_total
metrics.description: The total number of batch splits

metrics.name: kafka.producer.buffer_available_bytes
metrics.description: The total amount of buffer memory that is not being used (either unallocated or in the free list).

metrics.name: kafka.producer.buffer_exhausted_rate
metrics.description: The average per-second number of record sends that are dropped due to buffer exhaustion

metrics.name: kafka.producer.buffer_exhausted_total
metrics.description: The total number of record sends that are dropped due to buffer exhaustion

metrics.name: kafka.producer.buffer_total_bytes
metrics.description: The maximum amount of buffer memory the client can use (whether or not it is currently used).

metrics.name: kafka.producer.bufferpool_wait_ratio
metrics.description: The fraction of time an appender waits for space allocation.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.bufferpool_wait_time_total
metrics.description: The total time an appender waits for space allocation.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.byte_rate
metrics.description: The average number of bytes sent per second for a topic.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.byte_total
metrics.description: The total number of bytes sent for a topic.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.compression_rate
metrics.description: The average compression rate of record batches for a topic.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.compression_rate_avg
metrics.description: The average compression rate of record batches.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.connection_close_rate
metrics.description: The number of connections closed per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.connection_close_total
metrics.description: The total number of connections closed

metrics.name: kafka.producer.connection_count
metrics.description: The current number of active connections.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.connection_creation_rate
metrics.description: The number of new connections established per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.connection_creation_total
metrics.description: The total number of new connections established

metrics.name: kafka.producer.failed_authentication_rate
metrics.description: The number of connections with failed authentication per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.failed_authentication_total
metrics.description: The total number of connections with failed authentication

metrics.name: kafka.producer.failed_reauthentication_rate
metrics.description: The number of failed re-authentication of connections per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.failed_reauthentication_total
metrics.description: The total number of failed re-authentication of connections

metrics.name: kafka.producer.incoming_byte_rate
metrics.description: The number of bytes read off all sockets per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.incoming_byte_total
metrics.description: The total number of bytes read off all sockets

metrics.name: kafka.producer.io_ratio
metrics.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent doing I/O

metrics.name: kafka.producer.io_time_ns_avg
metrics.description: The average length of time for I/O per select call in nanoseconds.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.io_wait_ratio
metrics.description: The fraction of time the I/O thread spent waiting

metrics.name: kafka.producer.io_wait_time_ns_avg
metrics.description: The average length of time the I/O thread spent waiting for a socket ready for reads or writes in nanoseconds.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.io_waittime_total
metrics.description: The total time the I/O thread spent waiting

metrics.name: kafka.producer.iotime_total
metrics.description: The total time the I/O thread spent doing I/O

metrics.name: kafka.producer.metadata_age
metrics.description: The age in seconds of the current producer metadata being used.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.network_io_rate
metrics.description: The number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.network_io_total
metrics.description: The total number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections

metrics.name: kafka.producer.outgoing_byte_rate
metrics.description: The number of outgoing bytes sent to all servers per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.outgoing_byte_total
metrics.description: The total number of outgoing bytes sent to all servers

metrics.name: kafka.producer.produce_throttle_time_avg
metrics.description: The average time in ms a request was throttled by a broker

metrics.name: kafka.producer.produce_throttle_time_max
metrics.description: The maximum time in ms a request was throttled by a broker

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_error_rate
metrics.description: The average per-second number of record sends that resulted in errors

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_error_total
metrics.description: The total number of record sends that resulted in errors

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_queue_time_avg
metrics.description: The average time in ms record batches spent in the send buffer.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_queue_time_max
metrics.description: The maximum time in ms record batches spent in the send buffer.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_retry_rate
metrics.description: The average per-second number of retried record sends

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_retry_total
metrics.description: The total number of retried record sends

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_send_rate
metrics.description: The average number of records sent per second.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_send_total
metrics.description: The total number of records sent.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_size_avg
metrics.description: The average record size

metrics.name: kafka.producer.record_size_max
metrics.description: The maximum record size

metrics.name: kafka.producer.records_per_request_avg
metrics.description: The average number of records per request.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.request_latency_avg
metrics.description: The average request latency in ms

metrics.name: kafka.producer.request_latency_max
metrics.description: The maximum request latency in ms

metrics.name: kafka.producer.request_rate
metrics.description: The number of requests sent per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.request_size_avg
metrics.description: The average size of requests sent.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.request_size_max
metrics.description: The maximum size of any request sent.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.request_total
metrics.description: The total number of requests sent

metrics.name: kafka.producer.requests_in_flight
metrics.description: The current number of in-flight requests awaiting a response.

metrics.name: kafka.producer.response_rate
metrics.description: The number of responses received per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.response_total
metrics.description: The total number of responses received

metrics.name: kafka.producer.select_rate
metrics.description: The number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.select_total
metrics.description: The total number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform

metrics.name: kafka.producer.successful_authentication_no_reauth_total
metrics.description: The total number of connections with successful authentication where the client does not support re-authentication

metrics.name: kafka.producer.successful_authentication_rate
metrics.description: The number of connections with successful authentication per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.successful_authentication_total
metrics.description: The total number of connections with successful authentication

metrics.name: kafka.producer.successful_reauthentication_rate
metrics.description: The number of successful re-authentication of connections per second

metrics.name: kafka.producer.successful_reauthentication_total
metrics.description: The total number of successful re-authentication of connections

metrics.name: kafka.producer.waiting_threads
metrics.description: The number of user threads blocked waiting for buffer memory to enqueue their records
